areacode: Please enter the international area code for the non Chinese mainland phone number(International area code+Number)
noRepeat: You have already submitted, please do not click it again
serverBusy: Server is busy,Please try again later
notIndustry: This enterprise is not a industry edition
formatNotSupport: Phone number format is temporarily unsupported
agentServerError: Agent service error,please try again later
codeNotExist: The activation code does not exist or has been used
dataNotFound: There is no data to activate
codeCannotUse: The activation code is not available
createDataError: Activation code used successfully,but create data failed
companyNotExist: The company you apply for does not exist
inviteCode: Please enter the enterprise invitation code
inWeChat: Please complete the payment in WeChat

openDetail.manyStyle: A variety of styles themes and can be switched as you will, custom background, music, and theme display columns.
openDetail.light: Light up the screen,let others scan your screensaver to save your information,there is no need to go out with paper business card.
openDetail.customLink: Custom shop links, video, net disc, live broadcast, as long as there are links, everything can be integrated.
openDetail.smart: Intelligent marketing tools,it provide massive templates to choose. At the same time, the powerful editing function makes you easier to create first-class sales promotion pages, product opening activities, recruitment inviting applications and activities registration.
openDetail.support: It supports the introduction of the WeChat public number article,and you can edit it,insert your own ads.
openDetail.shipInCircle: A shop in your circle of friends,Each item can generate an independent QC code
openDetail.twoYearsDesc: Purchase two years, get half a year free
openDetail.threeYearsDesc: Purchase three years, get a year free
openDetail.orderNotFound: Could not find the order,or the order has been paid. please go back and submit again!
openDetail.takeOrderError: System error, please go back and submit again!
openDetail.jumping: Redirecting to payment page,do not refresh this page!
openDetail.notSupportThisYear: This industry does not provide the opening option of this year
